mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Family_space (name, invite_code, combi_type, nutrial, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{inviteCode}, #{combiType}, #{nutrial}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.uid, u.name, u.age, u.gender, u.join_date as joinDate, p.plan_id as planId, p.plan_name as planName, p.price, p.benefit FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Plans p ON u.plan_id = p.plan_id WHERE u.fid = #{fid} ORDER BY u.join_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as totalMembers, fs.combi_type as combiType FROM Users u JOIN Family_space fs ON u.fid = fs.fid WHERE u.fid = #{fid} GROUP BY fs.combi_type
